name: Total cases of poliomyelitis virus by country and year from 1980 onwards - WHO (2017)
title: Total cases of poliomyelitis virus by country and year from 1980 onwards - WHO (2017)
description: The WHO link above has the dataset saved under point "3.1 Reported incidence time series". The WHO last updated this dataset on 31 July 2017 which comprises the data shown here.
